channel.title: SilverTone Labs™ Presents: [Hyperion] RedLine #459
channel.description:
[center][img]http://bit.ly/dxJEcb[/img] [img]http://bit.ly/b7WDGG[/img][img]http://bit.ly/aJX4W3[/img][img]http://bit.ly/9yLw7X[/img] [img]http://bit.ly/9h3LAV[/img] [size=0.7em]By SilverTone Labs™ Powered by:[/size] [img]http://i288.photobucket.com/albums/ll175/24byt-team/Hyperion2.png[/img] [size=1em][font=century gothic][b][u]Our Player Killing Server is now up and running![/u][/b][/font][/size] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=RedlinePk-Beta.no-ip.org][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus/RedlinePk-Beta.no-ip.org.png[/img][/url] [/center] I am also accepting people for the #459 Beta program, please PM me on here, or our forums. [b][u]If you posted a "No" in the above poll, tell us why. That way we can make the server a better one.[/u][/b] [size=1em][font=century gothic][b][u]About SilverTone Labs:[/u][/b][/font][/size] SilverTone is a 2 man team dedicated to preparing a better tomorrow. Neither are known for much except their exceptional web work, and we hope to expand our popularity by building two RuneScape Private Servers based on two separate revisions: [ul][li]459 | Redline[/li] [li]317 | Redline-PK[/li][/ul] When we first got here, which was only a few days ago we noticed that 459's have become increasingly popular; however everyone has been using a (as we have heard) "glitched" source that goes by the name "Project Annihilation". We are only here to learn, we will not respond to any criticism, as we will not stoop down to a "flamers" level. We believe that people deserve what they have been trying to find: a [b]real server[/b], with [b]real staff[/b]. [size=1em][font=century gothic][b][u]About the Redline server: [/u][/b][/font][/size] The main server "Redline" will be based all over the map. This world will be for who like to "earn a living" and feel the[size=0.7em](hopefully) small[/size] adrenalin rushes when you get your first 99, kill, 10m, whip, and quest done. You will start off with [b][u]NOTHING[/u][/b], because you will have to visit all of your friends in lumbridge, and they will help you along your journey. The Economy will be strong, and slow, with every single mini-game and skill available. This will be the server that we are going to work the hardest on(obviously) and will be the best that we can offer, we will have active staff waiting to assist you with any of your questions. It will feature: [ul][li]Real Pking[/li] [li]Very stable, smooth pking[/li] [li]Over 20 Fully functional generated from anywhere on the map[/li] [li]Every Mini-game[/li] [li]Economy that will require every skill[/li] [li]Over 1500 Monsters and Civilians to train on throughout the map[/li] [li]No p-ringing staff[/li] [li]No glitched items[/li] [li]NO COMMANDS[/li] [li][b][u]NO customs[/u][/b][/li][/ul] Some Questions I think you might want answered: Q: Base? A: Hyperion #459, can be downloaded [url=http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/208487-hyperion-459-a.html]here[/url]. We will NOT be using PJA, as it is(even more) buggy from what I have been informed of. Q: How can we be sure that your not leeching PJA? A: Because we will be posting all our updates, even when things aren't finished, and we will be answering ALL questions about [u]anything[/u] you want to know. [size=1em][font=century gothic][b][u]Redline-PK: [/u][/b][/font][/size] The secondary server "Redline-PK" will be based in lumbridge. This world is designed for players who like to pk ALOT, and they don't like having to get money, buy items, and then go pking. You will start off with teletabs, and most basic items(because most people hate spawning supplies) like 1k sharks, 5k ppots, str/range/mage/att/def pots. There will be no economy, because there is(in development) a array-list of all items needed for combat, and they will be spawnable. It will feature: [ul][li]100% Pking[/li] [li]ALL 474 Items[/li] [li]All 474 animations[/li] [li]All 474 Gfx's[/li] [li]Very stable, smooth pking[/li] [li]Super-Quick stat setting[/li] [li]No p-ringing staff[/li] [li]No glitched items[/li] [li]No donor-only items[/li] [li][b][u]NO customs[/u][/b][/li][/ul] Some Questions I think you might want answered: Q: Why based in lumbridge if its a spawn server? A: Because(we hope) it will make it feel like old rs, the dying and spawning in lumbridge. Q: So is it going to [b]always[/b] be spawn server? A: Perhaps not, once our 459 is completed and all bugs fixed, this server will most likely be getting a [size=0.7em]small[/size] economy, dueling, quest for wielding weapons, godwars and small stuff like that. Q: What is the base for this PK server? A: Hyperion; because, although it is a Pking server, we don't want laggy pking, do we? Q: So how will you guys be able to keep this server up? A: We don't know yet, but we are thinking about adding a yell channel, and for donations, you may access it. [size=1.35em][font=century gothic][b][u]What goes around comes around: [/u][/b][/font][/size] Here at SilverTone Labs we believe that what you give, you recieve, which is why once our servers are out, and all our bugs are fixed, we are going to add an economy to our PK server and release it, yes thats right, we are going to be releasing our Pk server to the public! Why???? Because we feel that we should give something back to the community of which we were able to learn and understand so much. It will be a change to help starters learn how a server works. [center][size=1.45em][font=century gothic][b][u]Please feel free to ask any questions you feel intrigued to ask.[/u][/b][/font][/size][/center] Just some media: Mikey's Original photo of H459: [img]http://screensnapr.com/u/5dwp78.png[/img] Hyperion #459 ALL Maps loading (had it working about a week ago in show-off section): [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/733206/Guild.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/733208/WildDitch.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/763025/VarrockMaps.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/771888/Varrockmaps.png[/img] A Small preview of the Pking server [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/772687/dbow.gif[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/772749/win.gif[/img] Server Progress: [b]
[size=4][font=century gothic]Legend:[/font][/size] [X] | Present Bugs [SS] | Structure is done [✓] | Done [II] | Incomplete [?] | Not started
[/b] [size=3][font=century gothic][b][u]Redline Player killing server: [/u][/b][/font][/size] [b]Basic Info -[/b] [ul][li][/li][li][✓]All 474 Items loading[/li][li][✓]All 474 objects[/li][li][✓]All 474 emotes[/li][li][✓]All 474 graphics[/li][li][/li][/ul] [b][u]Basic Combat -[/u][/b] [b]Melee -[/b] [ul][li][X]All specials[/li] [li][/li][li][✓]Good combat formula[/li][li][✓]Timers[/li][li][/li][/ul] [b]Magic -[/b] [ul][li][/li][li][✓]All Spells[/li][li][✓]Timers[/li][li][✓]Delays[/li][li][✓]Distances[/li][li][/li][/ul] [b]Range -[/b] [ul][li][/li][li]Projectiles[/li][li]Specials[/li][li]Arrow types and strengths[/li][li]All bows[/li][li][/li][li][II][X]Timers[/li][li][/li][/ul] [size=3][font=century gothic][b][u]Redline server: [/u][/b][/font][/size] [b]Banking -[/b] [ul][li][✓] Item saving[/li] [li][✓] Noting support[/li] [li][✓] Storing & withdrawing (1,5,10,X,All)[/li] [li][✓] Re Arranging with saving positions[/li] [li][?] Deposit Boxes[/li][/ul] [b]Shops - [/b] [ul][li][✓] Buying[/li] [li][✓] Selling[/li][/ul] [b]Trading - [/b] [ul][li][✓] Removing[/li] [li][✓] Fixed (known) Dupes[/li] [li][✓] Confirm screen[/li] [li][✓] Offering & Removing (1,5,10,X,All)[/li] [li][✓] Other players available inventory slots[/li][/ul] [b]Woodcutting -[/b] [ul][li][?] Tree Spirit[/li] [li][✓] All Trees[/li] [li][✓] All Axes[/li] [li][✓] Canoes[/li] [li][✓] Helpful Equipment[/li] [li][I] Bird Nests[/li][/ul] [b]Prayer [All(known) Bugs fixed] -[/b] [ul][li][✓] Bone burying[/li] [li][✓] Protect Prayers[/li] [li][✓] Prayers[/li] [li][✓] Clothing[/li] [li][✓] Prayer Books[/li][/ul] [b]Cooking -[/b] [ul][li][✓] Potions[/li] [li][✓] Equipment[/li] [li][✓] All Fish[/li] [li][✓] All Foods[/li][/ul] [b]Firemaking -[/b] [ul][li][?]Lighting logs on ground[/li] [li][SS][II] All Logs[/li] [li][?] Autowalking[/li] [li][?] Bow lighting[/li][/ul] [b]Fishing[/b] [b]-[/b] [ul][li][✓] Gear[/li] [li][✓] Potions[/li] [li][SS][II] Random Events(whirlpools, river trolls)[/li][/ul] [size=3][font=century gothic][b][u]Will be adding more lists as we complete them...[/u][/b][/font][/size] [b]Credits -[/b] [ul][li]Ben[/li] [li]Martin Jones[/li] [li]Graham[/li] [li]Anthony[/li][/ul] [size=3][font=century gothic][b][u]Will be adding more lists as we complete them...[/u][/b][/font][/size] [b]Credits -[/b] [ul][li]Ben[/li] [li]Martin Jones[/li] [li]Graham[/li] [li]Anthony[/li][/ul]

item.title: SilverTone Labs™ Presents: [Hyperion] RedLine #459
item.dc:creator: @G0ds_Arr0w0s G0ds Arr0w0s
item.description:
@G0ds_Arr0w0s wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:25, topic:353757”][quote author=G0ds Arr0w0s link=topic=450064.msg3329918#msg3329918 date=1283389547]

It’s just another PI

Sorry, Ant told me you were disappointed bout the maps, I thought he had them.

Also, no you are incorrect.

Its a Hyperion base.

You logged in.
Said you were disappointed in the maps.
and you logged out.
(From what Ant told me)

Correct?
[/quote]

Correct. I also noticed that the entire game has been left empty. I would’ve opened up your 459 first if I was you. And why are you running Hyperion with Slashscape client[/quote]

Gameplay?

Its a Player Killing Server
Not a skilling server…

Once we release you’ll see, it will all be based on pking. Thats all the server was meant to be.

The 459 was and is meaning to be the real server, skilling, pking, minigames, ect.

Also, because you can get Hyperion to run with just about any client, and we spent some time fixing T1 errors and such in the client, as well as removing un-needed stuff like game-frame switcher, Hp bars, ect.

[center]________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[CENTER][SIZE=3][FONT=Century Gothic][B][COLOR=Red]
Our Player Killing Server has been released! [SIZE=1]To play[/SIZE]


[/COLOR][/B][/FONT][/SIZE]

[SIZE=1]Pw: chickensrule[/SIZE][/CENTER]

[center]________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

Updates 9-5-10:

Shops -

[ul][li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Buying[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Selling[/li][/ul]

Trading -

[ul][li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Removing[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Fixed (known) Dupes[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Confirm screen[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Offering & Removing (1,5,10,X,All)[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Other players available inventory slots[/li][/ul]

Cooking -

[ul][li][COLOR=Lime][✓] [/COLOR]Potions[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] Equipment[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] All Fish[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓][/COLOR] All Foods[/li][/ul]

Firemaking -

[ul][li][COLOR=Red][?][/COLOR][COLOR=Lime] [/COLOR]Lighting logs on ground[/li]
[li][COLOR=Yellow][S][/COLOR][COLOR=DarkOrange][I][/COLOR] All Logs[/li]
[li][COLOR=Red][?][/COLOR] Autowalking[/li]
[li][COLOR=Red][?][/COLOR] Bow lighting[/li][/ul]

Fishing -

[ul][li][COLOR=Lime][✓] [/COLOR]Gear[/li]
[li][COLOR=Lime][✓] [/COLOR]Potions[/li]
[li][COLOR=Yellow][S][/COLOR][COLOR=DarkOrange][I][/COLOR] Random Events(whirlpools, river trolls)[/li][/ul]

FIXED LUNAR ISLAND MAPS 100%

Added 90%+? Blocking system

Includes:

[ul][li]All? Shields and right emotes[/li]
[li]All custom block emotes (dh axe, flail, anchor, ect.)[/li]
[li]Gets IDs from an array, which I have learned are faster than switch statments[/li]
[li]Works on both NPC and Players[/li][/ul]

Picture (sorry for such crappy quality):

[center]________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[center]

Just got a blog installed onto our site, now you can check for updates quick and fast.

Also, the Redline Servers now have their own blogs as well.[/center]

Read full topic
